req_spec.title: Airline Ticket Reservation requirements
req_spec.scope: All requirements for Airline Ticket Reservation web application

requirement.title: â€‹ATRS should have a customer user interface
requirement.description:
User Interfaces 4.1.1.1

Airline Ticket Reservation System should have a customer user interface.

requirement.title: ATRS should have an administrator user interface
requirement.description:
User Interfaces 4.1.1.2

Airline Ticket Reservation System should have an administrator user interface.

requirement.title: Customer user interface should have a GUI
requirement.description:
User Interfaces 4.1.1.3

Customer user interface should have a graphical user interface (GUI).

requirement.title: Administrator user interface should have a GUI
requirement.description:
User Interfaces 4.1.1.4

Administrator user interface should have a graphical user interface (GUI).

requirement.title: Specific dates for one-way trips
requirement.description:
Functional Requirements 4.2.1

Customer should be able to search flights for a specific date for one-way trips.

requirement.title: Specific date for round trips
requirement.description:
Functional Requirements 4.2.2

Customer should be able to search flights for specific dates for round trips.

requirement.title: Search flights for multiple destinations
requirement.description:
Functional Requirements 4.2.3

Customer should be able to search flights for multiple destinations.

requirement.title: Departure and arrival cities
requirement.description:
Functional Requirements 4.2.4

Customer should be able to manually enter the names of departure and arrival cities.

requirement.title: Sorting flights by price
requirement.description: Customer should be able to sort the list of possible flights by price

requirement.title: Sorting flights by duration of flight
requirement.description: Customer should be able to sort the list of possible flights duration of flight

requirement.title: Manually entering card details
requirement.description: System should offer payment via manually manually entering card details as default payment method to customer

requirement.title: Administrator can add new flight
requirement.description: Administrator should be able to add new flights to the system
